name: SM H
text: Love working with my gals at Surety! They are always on top of things!

name: Dan S
text: Great people to work with

name: Shauna Calhoun
text:
Me and my husband bought our house in July. We were told at closing to expect our deed in 6 weeks... I waited 8 weeks and I called and left a message with a receptionist who I had to call back the next day and said it could take 6 to 8 more weeks but it was indeed mailed out. As soon January hit we called and left messages, my realtor called and emailed and nothing finally my realtor was able to get in touch with her and she emailed her a copy of the deed. I thought everything was done boy was I wrong!
I went to file homestead exempt just for them to tell me that the deed is for the land only not for the trailer even though it was bought together. So now I'm having to sit in their lovely waiting room while they try and fix it. It has been a pain to get in touch with anyone from the start. They dont return your calls and they seem to be unavailable all day long when you call them.

name: Shane Herman
text:
Amanda did a great job today handling our home closing. She was very polite and prompt. She insured that we we well informed on the documents and had everything ready. They are being diligent with the Covid-19 concerns and made every effort to be responsible in their efforts to be compliant.
Thanks to Amanda at MLJ Escrow LLC.

name: Robin Ramsey
text: Very professional, very friendly, explained the contract completely.  Amanda Nash was easy to work with!

name: Colin Brown
text: Very helpful and efficient

name: Roger Pumphrey
text: Lady very professional

name: penny barreto
text: I would like to extend an earnest Thanks to my Attorney, Justin Clark.  His hard work and dedication provided support and alleviation of stress.  His utmost professionalism not only was provided, it was delivered with understanding and appreciation. Justin went the extra mile and   I am so blessed to have walked and an captured his service during my moments of doubt. Davidson, Davidson, Umbach & Forbus, LLC. I highly recommend this Attorney for his amazing work and tenacity during my case; Penny Barreto, (beyond 5 stars).

name: Lila Wright
text: We worked with Kelly and Rick Davidson, and Stephen Clay to handle a construction fraud lawsuit against a local contractor.  They were very honest and upfront in the beginning about the time required, and the emotional and financial costs.  They took a personal interest in our case genuinely cared about our feelings.  They were very professional at all times, communicated well with us, and were very diligent thorough out  the discovery process.  They provided reassurance and good information as we navigated the legal process. They were evenly balanced as negotiators. We were very pleased with the outcome and highly recommend this team of professionals for legal needs.  Ms. Kelly Davidson had also handled a closing for us in the past and we would also recommend her for that need as well.

name: Evan Crawford
text: Great office! Very professional and knowledgeable. Helpful in every way!

name: Ms Chrys
text: We Used Samantha Copelan for a family adoption case.  Samanthas professionalism, Knowledge of the law, and etiquette with not only the adults involved but the children as well can not be beat. If you need a family law attorney in the state of Alabama you dont need to look any further because she goes above and beyond even during a global pandemic and invests all of herself into her cases to get the best possible outcome.

name: Becca Bryant
text: We had the best experience with Samantha Copelan! We have used her multiple times in multiples different cases and she has always handled everything the best she possibly could. She also has the best attitude, always calming your worst worries and fears. My husband and I appreciate her greatly! She’s always our first choice.

name: Robert Young
text: Friendly staff,very knowledgeable and willing to help!!

name: Bill McCown
text: The team at Davidson Davidson and Umbach went beyond the call of duty to insure that my clients were able to close on their home before the Thanksgiving Holiday.  Kelly Davidson remained at the office until 7:30 pm.

name: Susan Crain
text: Very professional

name: Chanda Davis
text:
I’m the Broker of one of the fastest growing real estate companies in town! Let me first say, I do not think I could have grown so fast with ease without having an opportunity to have on-call legal relationships with two of the smartest attorneys know to man-kind.

This group of professionals have served as a GOD SEND to my agents, my clients, and myself. My company is supported on every end and I could not be more thankful.

The staff is always polite and considerate and very knowledgeable. Anyway! I could go on and on but - I think you get it.

name: Gabriel Long
text: We just closed with them recently and they handled everything for us. We were able to get in and out in no time. Craig was super nice and even kept our 2 year old son involved and entertained! Im recommending Paulus Title to everyone I know!

resp.text: Thanks Gabriel!  You were a pleasure to work with!  Hope you enjoy your new home.

name: Heather Freeman
text: Spent 3 hours going over all of the closing documents, only for them to tell me I couldn’t close. Something they knew at 3 hours earlier. If you can avoid this company, would highly recommend so.

resp.text: We are very sorry that you were disappointed by your closing experience. Your closing was rescheduled more than once. While we heard that this was due to punch list items with the builder, whatever the reason, a change to the closing date requires changes to the documents and figures. Moving a closing changes the documents and figures that are prepared by the lender, including tax pro-rations, per diem interest, prepaid charges (such as insurance, etc.) and it can sometimes impact escrow accounts, payoffs, title commitments, and tax payments. It is a cumbersome process, but you were not charged extra for the additional processing or costs we incurred in preparing your package (4 times) and returning the lenders wire (3 times). Please enjoy your new home.

name: Invest Amido
text: I highly recommend working with Paulus Title on any real estate transactions. The staff is knowledgable and provide excellent service. As an out of state investor it's invaluable to work with a local title company who knows what they are doing and can do it well.

name: Regan Christian
text: Easy parking, clean building, great staff

name: Stephanie McGuire
text: Paulus Title provides excellent customer service for my clients making closings easy and efficient. Craig and his staff are friendly, responsive and always eager to solve some of the most unique Real Estate transactions. They are prepared prior to closing avoiding any last minute surprises. I highly recommend them for all of your Real Estate needs.

name: Keri Hilton
text: Shame on you for treating my friend so poorly.

name: Chris Edmondson
text: We closed on our new home with this company and they were great! Great group to work with, thanks guys for all the help!!

name: Jessica Hill
text: Friendly and professional. Great experience

name: Kirk Austin
text: Easy to find and friendly staff

name: allen Henry
text: Good place to get glasses

name: Travis Howard
text: Great office to work with!

name: Jessica Hinote
text: Very helpful!

name: Kenneth Stewart
text: Good job

name: Cayne Harrelson
text: great company always does a great job

name: Inesha McCarter
text: South Oak Title in Pelham, AL was hired to do my title work on the closing of my home in 2019. South oak was supposed to review all of the title information to make sure that we were clear to close. I was given the OK to close however several months later I received a letter from HUD stating that I owe them $65,000. This should’ve all come up during the closing process when they were reviewing the documents but it did not. South Oak did not properly review my documents and now it it causing me to have to pay a lot of money out of pocket that I do not have. South Oak has refused to take responsibility for this action and I’m very upset and I’m going to make sure that some responsibility is held. I should be refunded for the charges since an incomplete and negligent job was performed, as well as given some assistance with the repayment as this should have been taken care of by them at the closing table. Not to mention that the buyers of my home DO NOT have a clear title, so if they ever wanted to sell their house, they would be unable to.

name: Christie White
text: Had the best experience using South Oak for a client. They were professional during the entire process.

name: Tiffany Walls
text:
Absolute delight to be here. The office is beautiful and Sandy Johnson was an absolute delight to work with and facilitate our transaction and answer any questions we had. We did not feel rushed, the team was informative and responsive leading up to closing day (thanks Cassy!) and closing and was smooth. Absolutely would recommend and I hope to work with them again as an agent!

Just make sure your maps direct you to the right location. The office is tucked away behind the Pregnancy Resource Center next to Pelham City Hall.

name: Allison Walls
text: We closed on our house today. Everything was explained efficiently and effectively. No time was wasted! Sandy made it super simple and best of all, we went to the same alma mater! I would highly recommend Sandy and her team!

name: Brian Devereaux
text: Awesome staff, great place to do your home closing.

name: Cindy Roberts
text: Everything was perfect! Thank you!

name: Mario Staples
text: Do all of my paperwork. Jason always takes great care of me and my customers.

text: Very Good

name: RealTruth4u1 /John Wesley Seagle
text: Must-see!

name: stevehart001
text: I was the Wholesaler on this closing and I communicated with Lynda in Title and Amy in Closing. They kept me informed and up to date on the whole process. The receptionist was very pleasant when I called. Jeff, the attorney was very friendly and made my clients feel at ease. He explained everything  thoroughly.  I actually learned a couple of things from him.  Their office is bright and comfortable. I hope to close with them again. Great job! - Steven Hart - Birmingham Area Investment Properties.

name: Cindi Church
text: They do no return their phone calls even though voicemails were left.

name: Chris Warren
text: These are professionals.  They worked through a tricky sales process that most title companies would not have been able to accomplish.  They came highly recommended and I see why.  I will use them again and am happy to recommend them to others.

name: Kristy Akers
text: Jeff and his team did an outstanding job of getting everything taken care of when I sold my house in June 2019.  I appreciate everything they did for me. I would definitely use Members Title again.

name: Tom Ogletree
text: Nice & smooth closing. Very nice staff!!

name: Rebecca Ray
text: Extremely nice people here!

name: Morgan Smith
text:
Sold our house and our mortgage didn't get paid off because supposedly Fedex lost the check. I had to follow up with Members Title about this bc they didn't double check that my 150k check to the mortgage company was delivered (need to update their process on this).

Was told that they would reimburse us for extra days of interest, followed up 5+ times with Jeff Morris, but he's stopped returning my emails. So now I have to post a bad review to hopefully get them to fulfill their duty. Bad customer service all around. Feel free to respond back to my email.

name: Rosalie Pribbenow
text: I'm a local real estate agent and I would close anywhere else! Jeff and Amy are the best!

name: Rob Irby
text: I have had the privilege of closing numerous transactions  with Members Title over the past 9 years. They are always accommodating to their clients needs and conduct business in a professional manner.

text: Too crowded

name: Kathy Bryars
text: Top notch title company!  Great communication during the entire transaction.  I really am not a fan of surprises and I have never had one with ALT.  Awesome closer and helpful professional staff. Never disappointed with the service I've received here.

text: We LOVE this place. We always feel like we're at home and they make sure we're comfortable and taken care of on closing day. Honored to do business with this great group of people.

text: They were late with everything, did nothing but make excuses, and rude on top of it all.  They treat you like they are doing you a favor because they are so overworked. Save yourself the trouble and close somewhere else.

text: They were late with all our requests and held up our closing for almost a week. They were also rude and unprofessional in the closing itself... I was surprised and disappointed by them at every turn.

name: Stephen Harrison
text: I have been a real estate broker with RE/MAX of Gulf Shores and have conducted business with Gulf Shores Title Company for over 25 years and they are absolutely my go to title company. Communication is wonderful and their professionalism is first class. I would highly recommend!

resp.text: Thank you Stephen. We appreciate you and your clients!

name: Alla Nikitina
text: Outstanding title company with amazing staff and very knowledgeable closing agents. We used them for all our closings, no matter if its residential or commercial, and have never had one little issue. Everything is done perfect and on time. If sometimes occur during the closing they’ll fix it immediately.

resp.text: Thank you Alla. We appreciate your trust and we appreciate you!

name: William Greenlee
text: Piss poor customer service regarding providing title insurance. Sat on docs for 11 day's then sent a email instead of a phone call. The email basically said that the file is to detailed. No explanation.

resp.text: It is unfortunate that we were not able to assist with your closing. In this case after careful review of recorded documents, the trust documents and the power of attorney our underwriter would not allow us to insure title on the transaction. There are some transactions that simply cannot be insured and this was one of those transactions.

name: Bryan Long
text: My wife and I were first time homebuyers and we felt so lost at first. Thank goodness for Jennifer Godwin and Mr. Jim Owen!!! They were there every step of the way with friendly demeanor and incredibly insightful! Even with a late addendum added to the contract just a few days prior to closing, they still were able to get everything in order! Great team and even better people. It was also nice to find out they are big contributors to local community clubs, organizations, and fundraisers! Use them every time.

resp.text: Glad she did a great job for you!

name: Mary Edwards
text: Thank you to Jim Owen, Jennifer, and the whole Gulf Shores Title team!Smoothest closing I’ve ever had:) If you want someone local and trusted, this is the place. Highly recommend!!!

resp.text: Thank you Mary, we appreciate your business and the opportunity to be of service.

name: kim warner
text: Love Gulf Shores Title.  Great company!

resp.text: We appreciate you and your clients Kim!

name: Karin Harms
text: I wish I could give them no stars. Our experience was horrible. They had ample time to finalize our closing documents, because the property almost sold, that buyer backed out at the last minute, then we purchased it. All told, they had around 3 months with the property documents and still asked for 2 extensions. At our closing, which was the last possible day our financing was approved (because of the 2 extensions), our closing appointment took over 3 hours and we didn't finish. Our closing agent became very upset with us for "rushing" her into the closing and repeatedly told us in the room that we should have given her more time. Then, she waited until after 5 pm to contact our bank, so they had already closed and she accused us of choosing a "bad" lender. Thankfully, we had a great realtor (Tracy Gardner) who went back there the next day to finalize everything for us. This included getting our refund, because the closing company never even told us how much money to bring to closing, because she "hadn't gotten that far yet". All through the process, they never returned calls, they were rude and very unprofessional. Other reviews online show we're not the only ones to experience this horrible service. I honestly don't know how they are still in business.

name: Carl Myrick
text: Awesome service and experience.

resp.text: Thank you Carl, we appreciate the feedback.

name: Linda Nichols
text: Debbie Butghart completed my closing & I was totally impressed by her knowledge & professionalism .

resp.text: Glad to hear you had a great experience with Debbie.

name: Cory Hendricks
text: Nice fast  Service

name: Rachel Noble
text: Great experience

text: Love them they'll help you the best way they can but go see two of the women that works there, there so sweet and helpful please go see them of you need them.

text: Very efficient and prompt with our closing. Answered all our questions fast. Great group of people to work with. Definitely recommend them to everyone.

text: Excellent customer service, first rate company.  Will definitely use again.  I called several area companies, and they not only responded the fastest, but were also the least expensive.

name: Average Jo
text: North Alabama Title & Escrow is awesome!  My company works with them often and the never disappoint.  Adria and her staff are on top of every step of the title/loan process to help insure our files close on time and with little hiccup.  I would highly recommend them for your real estate closing or title needs.  We love doing business with them and plan to continue doing so for a long time.

name: Dan F
text:
Great service and very responsive.  They handled the closing on the sale of our house and it went flawlessly.  There were difficulties we encountered but they knew exactly who to contact to resolve them.  I wish they'd have been available for the closing on the house we bought (in another market area, way outside their operating area); I'd bet we wouldn't have had half the purchase closing problems we encountered there.

Very highly recommended for closing your property sale or purchase, they're that good.

name: Coleen Driggers
text: Excellent staff and wonderful prices! Always quick to answer questions and explain the process behind their work!

name: Ashley Clem
text: We were there to sell our house to a new family out of state. They stayed with us until the check came through and cleared. They were polite offering their seats to anyone that might need to have a seat. They offered us drinks and coffee and it was precious how they had hot cocoa for our 3 year old. It was also nice to set how they treated our lifetime and incredible real estate agent.

name: Rebecca Pullen
text: There are really bad title companies out there. I really had no idea until we started selling houses and had to use the title company of the buyers choice. I knew Adria and her team was great but I didn't know just how many light-years they are over other local title companies. We have closed with North Alabama Title just under 10 times I think. I didn't know how good we had it! It's really nice to have someone that we can depend on! I am so appreciative! THANK YOU!

name: Jonathan Sanders .J

text: Favorite spot to go

text: Got it done

name: Amy Rogers
text: Fast

name: Denise Presley
text: Wonderful people. Good experience

name: Jessica Carmichael
text: The worst experience I've ever had at a closing office, including the 8 years I worked in different closing offices. Stephanie was rude, and lacked any class or professionalism. She refused to give me a copy of the title commitment or settlement statement prior to closing. It was several days after closing, and after a threat of specific performance, before she would even email me a copy of the deed to get my utilities turned on.

name: Julie McCay
text: We were set to close on our mother's property. The way this was handled by Stephanie Dabbs was so disrespectful. Her office made a mistake in closing, and had us come in and sign papers. Instead of explaining that ..she blamed me and my siblings. She held our checks for a while even though dated the date we signed the contract claiming she needed to do this or that. She was hard to talk to and was defensive. Find a company that honors your business because Stephanie and this location does not.

name: Ryan
text: Worst company ever to deal with.  Company is very unprofessional and believes in giving the runaround. This location doesn't believe in sticking to deadlines and having a sense of urgency. I wouldnt recommend this company to anyone if you are serious about handling professional business or making sure you information is accurate.

name: TJ Sayers
text: My Real Estate Investment company uses Reli Title for all of our title needs. We have ordered over 150 titles from Reli since 2014  and they are always very quick and efficient. Stephanie Dabbs and her team at Reli is always very knowledgable and helpful with any issues that arise. I would highly recommend them to anyone with title or closing needs.

name: Robert Mashburn
text: Great people and services

name: James Nelson
text: I have never been here but Google keeps harassing me about rating this place.

name: William Lawrence
text: Very professional! What else would you expect from a company whose name is Professional Land Title.  Process took less than 20 minutes. They explained each page in terms we could understand. If you are buying or selling in Gulf Shores, Foley, Orange Beach use them!

name: Damon Huckleberry

name: Daniel Humphries

I have worked with the women in this office for years and they take pride in their work and treat their clients with respect. I recommend using them for all of your real estate closings!

name: B Simon
text: Years ago they did a closing for me it was quick, friendly, easy and 10 days. I'm writing this because I recently called for some information regarding that closing, they were friendly and had what I needed within the hour. 5 stars because there isn't a sixth to give them.

text: Great service from the pastor at the front desk #blessed. Great car selection, the best place to rent a car in town!!

name: jon doe
text: They are crooks!  a friend of mine Elizabeth Tench,,traded her van to them for a 2009 yukon,,,from the start all she had was problems,,it wouldn't crank half the time. it would leave you stranded for hours while you tried to start it..then also Dean's auto never would get the right paperwork to her so she could get a tag ,,she had it for a month and they kept giving her the run arround ,,,the van she traded them for the yukon they already sold ,,so when she took the yukon back they took it, and didn't give her anything back in return and made her sign a paper forfieting any payback ,,,,DEAN"S AUTO,,CROOKS with a capital C

name: Anthony Brown
text: Very helpful!

name: angela downs
text: I wasnt happy with them at all.i put a down payment on a 2010 chevy malibu silver 4 door car.had it 3 wks it stayed in the shop.wipers never were fixed.finally got the ac to cool.at my daughters house had a hard time keeping it cranked.i took it back.signed release form.the next day its back out there in the front for sale again.bad experience for me

name: June Johnson (Yaya)
text: Really nice rentals

name: Old Salty Skull
text: I wished there was a no star rating because these horrid little people, petty thieves, liars, crooks will drain you of every penny they can before taking back their useless, third rate junk salvaged cars

text: So people were not forthcoming  about the vehicles and we're very rude and impersonal so hard to work with on payment plan and Larry dishonest about the mechanical problems with the car

text: Great place to rent a car.

text: Terrific People

name: William wilson
text: Good service

name: janice johnson
text: Joe Davis is awesome. Guided us thru our sale of estate house.

name: Henry Stringfellow
text: The staff was great,and very helpful.

name: K'Cee Ortiz
text: Great customer service & closing was done quickly. Big place with good area for waiting comfortably, as well as a conference room for business privacy.

name: Larissa Walker
text: We have worked with multiple title companies in the past, and this one is by far the worst in terms of lack of communication and efficiency. They seem to have little or no experience with out of state buyers, which created major last-minute hardships for us and our realtor's team that could have been avoided by a few quick phone calls or emails. Many times I felt like they were hoping we weren't familiar with the closing process based on steps they tried to change or skip. Overall, it was a very disorganized and stressful closing that didn't need to be that way. We used Surety Title at the seller's discretion but will never do business with them again if we have the choice.

name: Ryan Baker
text: Quick, Smooth and professional!

name: Cheryl McCoy
text: Very nice and professional staff

name: Elisabeth Martins
text: Joe Davis is absolutely the bet ot the best. He went above and beyond to make sure the home sold and the closing went smoothly. TY Joe for all of your hard work.

text: They are very nice people. We would do business with  them again when we go to buy another house.

name: Billy McLeod
text: In and out quickly. Did great work.

name: Hap Partridge
text: Joe Davis gave awsome service!

name: Good Citizen (Good Citizen)
text: Extremely unmotivated team.  By far, the worst title company I have dealt with. Will not be conducting business there in the future.

name: Amazing Grace
text: Honest people

name: William Bradley
text: Smooth easy transaction. Alice Morris is awesome in Daphne. Guarantee will be our choice for title work from now on.

name: niki ferguson
text: Alice with Guarantee Title was amazing. She was so easy to work with, very thorough & knowledgeable. This was honestly the best experience we have dealt with out of any title company. We highly recommend them.

name: Gale Mann
text: Title personnel very knowledgeable and professional. I was in and out in a  very short time. Everything was ready for signing and explained in full.

name: Amy H
text: Sentinel Title helped my buyers close on their home in 20 days! That is unheard of but we all pulled together as a team and got the work done in record time. I give all credit to the hard work Phyl Bolton put in on nights and weekends. She and her staff were professional and did an outstanding job for me and my buyers!

name: Jenise Brocks
text:
My buyer and I had a great experience with Sentinel Title, Sam was awesome closing the deal and Phyl was awesome also and returned calls within minutes. Will definitely use again. And I love the office and the space, so professional and clean inside.
Jenise Brocks~Realtor~EXIT Realty Gulf Shores

name: BRIAN ARMSTRONG
text: Mrs. Bolton was not only very professional; she was quick to respond to any email or phone calls right away.  That was one of the easiest closings done.

name: Monica Fleeman
text: We had a great experience with this title company! They worked on a Sunday to make sure our closing would go through on time! Very professional, understanding, and caring! Would highly recommend.

resp.text: Thanks for the kind response Monica, let us know if we can help with anything else!

name: Anithea M
text: In and out. Very clean building, very professional

name: Rachael White
text: Great people. Great company!

name: KIMBERLY MELTON
text: Josh at Sentinel Title was a joy to work with and very detail oriented with our buyer!  He explained everything that may have been confusing to the buyer and an expert in his field. I would highly recommend Josh and this company!

resp.text: Thanks so much for the kind words Kimberly! We hope to work with you again soon.

name: Tyler Thompson
text: Wonderful experience closing on our new home. Very friendly staff and very quick and thorough. Definitely recommend!

name: Brandy Wickliffe
text: Meg is a great lawyer. All options put on the table and very knowledgeable. Great staff as well

name: Seth Tanner
text: Nice and professional. They understand

name: Vickie Roden
text: Very helpful

name: Darlene Willis
text: Very nice people. Helped alot

name: Myrna Kervin
text: Made the whole process very easy and came to our house.

name: Chris S
text: This is a Great attorney!

name: Crystal Huey (Crystal Beckom)
text: Very nice, helpful firm. Thanks Amber!

name: Angel Early
text: They had papers ready when we got there

name: Adam Beams
text: Best place to close in Tuscaloosa in my opinion!  The staff is phenomenal!

name: Deborah Jordan
text: Very professional service

name: Alvin Holman
text: Great people. Made a bad experience into a great one. Could not have asked for better.

name: DE Hallman
text: Tuscaloosa’s Best service in the business. I only use Wade Wilson and Queen City Title for my closings in T-Town because they always deliver the best service in a timely and professional manner.

name: Jason Polancich
text: Great group of attorneys who are down to earth, professional and completely helpful. We just moved to town and have several businesses. Wade has been great at jumping in and helping us when we need and we'll continue to use them going forward. Highly recommend for real estate and general business issues.

name: Jake Apperson
text: They did the closing on our house and were top notch on everything. Totally professional.

name: C Williams
text: Everyone was helpful and accommodated a last minute change in our closing......

name: Laird Culver
text: Friendly, professional and quick.

resp.text: Thank you very much for the kind words.

name: Lorena Ardines
text:
We just signed some papers with them.
They were amazing help us to understand each paper, waited until we finished to read whatever we feel we needed to read (that wasn't little), answer every question (and I asked a lot, is in my nature).
We had a much different experience with a different group.
Alabama Land Title even help us with a last minute request. They definitely deserve the 5 starts.

name: Sara Winchester
text: I had a great experience with ALL of the ladies there, very willing to help! Very professional, easy to work with, communication was stellar and I will recommend to anyone. Kaitlin, especially called me several times after my lender dropped the ball, and she was amazing and very helpful. Thank you all!

resp.text: We are so glad that we were able to help.  We appreciate you!!

name: Jeannette Bartell
text: A great group of ladies working here.  They are efficient and professional!

resp.text: We love working with you.

name: Rance Reehl
text: Alabama Land Title is one of the absolute best providers of title and closing services in Baldwin County.  Their staff is polite and efficient in every standard and Aurelia does an amazing job of closing sales in a timely fashion and explaining everything whether you are on the buying or selling side.  They get a 5-star rating from me in all aspects and a great pleasure to work with.

name: Dougie Duncan
text: Awesome when I closed on my new house. In and out in less than an hour. Highly recommend

resp.text: We are so glad that you had a great experience.  We strive hard to make the closing process easy for everyone.

name: Cabin Life
text: Quick, efficient and friendly but we didn’t get to see the settlement statement until closing.

name: Mary Haines
text: Super great to work with.

name: mary morrison
text: We’ve closed on many properties over the years and this was by far the best experience we’ve ever had. Aurelia and her team went above and beyond to make everything go seamlessly. My husband and I will never use anyone else!

resp.text: Thank you so much.  It was a pleasure working with you.  We hope to see you again soon.

name: Regina Fraley
text: Aurelia and her staff are the best. Everyone in the office is proactive and diligent, while maintaining the warm spirit of Baldwin County that we all enjoy.  They know their job and do it VERY well. I recommend them to all.

resp.text: Thank you so much.  We strive to give good customer service and make closing day a great experience.

name: Connie Bobbitt
text: Great experience.  Very professional!

name: Clare Anderson
text: Alabama Land Title did a great job for us. They were efficient and their attention to detail was impressive. Everyone was friendly and responsive. Thanks!

name: Chris Haley
text: I have had many closing with title agent Aurelia Bryars.  She is always well prepared and efficient.  She pays close attention to the details and makes any corrections necessary before the closing time. I will continue to use Alabama Land Title for any future closings.

resp.text: Thank you so much.  Our team always enjoys working with you.  We appreciate your business.

name: me to you
text: Everything went smoothly.

resp.text: So glad that everything went well.  We enjoyed working with you.

name: Caitlin McNeely
text: My closing was smooth, fast, and overall easy from start to finish! I would recommend closing at Alabama Land Title to anyone who wants to make sure everything is done right and professionally!

name: Randy Brooks
text: Solid, great service, all persons did a great job!

name: Patty Schrage
text: Title Agent Aurelia was present and did not intervene when a deed was passed to me to sign and I was clearly under duress.  I walked out of the title company.

name: Shannon Hesse
text: Dependable and professional EVERY time!

name: Miles Neumann
text: Fast,Efficient and simply the very BEST!

name: Sherry Anderson
text: They are wonderful!! Very friendly!They made everything go smoothly and I would  highly recommend them.

name: Will Mason
text: Bold Title was great. Easiest closing we have ever done, and there were no surprises. I highly recommend Bold Title and will use them in the future.

name: Leon Edwards
text: Closing activity was fast and efficient. They were prepared and ready and friendly professional service.

name: Rebecca Patton
text: Friendly staff and very smooth and quick process in closing on our home! Highly recommend!

name: Nitashia Harris
text: Customer friendly very clean establishment

name: Gary Phillips
text: Good people

name: Cade Waren
text: Needs a bit of a cleanup bit for a farm supply place it's very polite

name: Sandra Ward
text: They did a great job of cracking my pecans. Their price was very reasonable.

name: Carl Royer
text: Great friendly folks, there to serve you.

name: Carl Jackson
text: Anything you could want for the farm. Great people

name: Rick Austin
text: They got what you need here. Nice folks.

name: Sam Tate
text: I was shopping for corn so I could Hog hunt had just what I needed nice friendly people.

name: Randy Englebert
text: Great little farm supply, you know what they have till you go see

name: Keith Sasser
text: Small place if you’re gonna try to get a “big rig” in here to load/unload but it can be done. I did.

name: Calvin Higginbottom
text: Nice people

name: Vikki Hannah
text: Awesome people and place to shop!!!

name: Vivian Williams
text: Closing on my home was quick and straight to the point, probably took an hour. Even with me asking open ended questions. They seemed to have no issues ensuring I understood everything

name: MiChelle Knight
text: Oh my goodness, the pancakes were great! Great service and atmosphere was cool and family oriented

name: Tk Bham
text: Great staff!

name: LAZ LAZ
text: Very friendly

name: Pam Ashcraft
text: Easy process and very friendly

name: Vision Lounge SC
text: This is company is very slack and the  slowest title company of all time. Every time I called there was some excuse as to why they hadn’t done my paperwork. They would tell the seller things but not keep me informed. It’s taking over a month for them to close! I don’t even know the close cost yet but yet they claim we are closing. Never again. If you see this title company do yourself a favor and run.

name: Joe Prokop
text: This closing company was very professional. Office was very nice and clean. Staff was professional and prepared for our closing. Documents were organized well. Things went quickly and we're done accurately.

name: Bruce Pajak
text: Very sufficient and professional people who work here. Handled everything smoothly, and took the time to explain something if you didn't understand what it was you where signing off on.

name: Christine Virgil
text: Very good place to close. Efficient and friendly.  Easy access off 280.

name: Joe Impello
text:
Horrible. I was seller and it was the worst closing I have ever seen. Poor communication, disregard for customer and bullying me to close. Closing was a few days away and when I called to ask when and what time they said they had 39 closings on Monday Sept 21 and would need to push us back. Really? I told them I couldn't and they said come in Friday Sept. 18. Ok...
Friday came and at the table was the first time I saw my ALTA and it was wrong in several places. They failed to find and list my mortgage. Unfortunately, I disclosed I had a mortgage. They said "whew" thanks for being honest... Really? They also listed several sewer leins that I am NOT responsible for. We went round and round and round for days! They apparently do not know Jefferson County mor do they know what a compliance letter is. They tried to strong arm me by saying " they needed to close this now and I work it out later" Really? After 29 emails I finally spoke with the owner of the company, Gill. He passed me off to some other attorney named Tyler who actually cared about me and said I was correct and not responsible for the leins.  Duh! That's what I was telling them for days..... I asked them to refund me the attorney fees associated with the closing and they refused. The buyers closed on Monday Sept. 21 as scheduled but I did not get resolved until the following Friday Sept. 25. When I finally received a correct ALTA I discovered they did not refund the attorney fees. Horrible.!.

name: J Moses
text: Closed on 3 houses there. They are very fast and thorough. Great staff!

name: Jay Clyce
text:
I have been in the mortgage business for 5 years.  Reli is one of my favorites to work with.  I find myself going to them a lot not just because I like their efficiency amd effectiveness but because many of my transactions are directed by other parties from my real estate transactions.  They are well known.

This is a phenomenal team for residential real estate title and closings.  Natalie Pippin is a rock star.  Great hire Kent!

name: Charlie Graham
text: I had my first closing with them yesterday and they did a great job. Very impressed by how professional their staff is how great of a job they did taking care of the needs for the closing. Even when it got moved up they made it happen in pinch. Every Realtor in Birmingham needs to give them a shot at your next closing because they will get it done!

name: William Posey
text: I have been on the "seller's" side with this company twice now.  I'd like to take a moment and say that I've enjoyed both transactions as a seller.  I would highly recommend utilizing Reli for any of your real estate needs or closing services.  A special thank you to Cathy Tindle and Caitlin Graham for their professionalism and communication during what can be (and was) a frustrating and unprofessional situation with the buyer (and their real estate agent) that bought my property.  Kudos for the Reli team managing this situation.  Just wanted to provide some honest feedback for anybody and/or company inquiring about Reli here in Birmingham.

name: James Hervey
text: Very nice and knowledgeable of there job

name: Nikolay Grigoryev
text: Closed on my new home. Very nice office, they made sure everything went smooth and explained all the nuances.

name: Robert Hubbard
text: A really nice office with very friendly people. Makes wonder if closing cost could be lower if I wasn't paying for a $5000 conference table.

name: Brian Baulch
text: Reli has always been an invaluable resource to me and my clients when working to get a real estate transaction completed.  Kent and his entire staff always go above and beyond in their knowledge, care, timeliness, and attention to detail.  If you want it closed on time or early, Reli is one place you can guarantee that happening.

name: Jennifer Gilbert
text: Reli has closed many homes for me as a local realtor. They always do an excellent job!

name: Brad Moore
text: Great Title Company to close with! Office was very warming, staff was charming and very knowledgeable. Can't wait to close there again.

name: Marsha Bates- Pike
text: I close with RELI every transaction I have the opportunity! I also use the title department for my titles. Cathy Tidwell, Jackie Morgan and the whole gang take very good care of their clients!!

name: Tony Hubka
text: Tuscaloosa is awesome.  Always get my files closed on time.  I highly recommend!!!!

name: Mary Harmon Young Pritchett-Moore
text: Nikki and Janie are so nice and helpful! They are fast and responsive too!

name: S. L.
text: The staff wasn't welcoming nor friendly at all

name: stan gillard
text:
Really nice friendly an professional
Closing home loans

name: Kate Magee
text: Similar to Mr. Eubanks review below, very expensive mistakes were made in the title process for a house resulting in $1k loss for buyers, additional $ loss for sellers, and 3 months of each party's time. It was not handled professional by the agent -- not admitting mistakes, not being up front with the buyers, etc. We don't recommend working with this company!

name: Jason “Birmingham HomeBuyers LLC” LeSueur
text: We use RELI and Stephanie Dabbs on almost a daily basis.  They always provide us title and closing services in a  professional and timely manner.

name: Shannon C
text: Expensive and closing process took about 2 months. Communications from them were slow.

name: Steve Eubanks
text: Kaitlin made error in not calling tax assessor to verfiy taxes to seller,this cost buyer an extra $772 in taxes. This was her mistake, but she offered no restitution for the loss to the buyer .Very unprofessional to not make this mistake and cost buyer for her incompetence!

name: Michelle Posey
text: Friendly, clean, and easy

name: Kristen Blaylock
text: Kind staff. Smooth, uneventful closing.

name: Brittany Sanders
text: Professional staff who facilitated closing during the sale of my house

name: heather klein
text: Great place, very helpful and kind staff.

name: Keith Copeland
text: Professional and courteous service at etowah abstract. Think they have been in business 160 years + -. Jeff and Luanne a handsome couple of workers

name: suzy b
text: Loved it the roast beef and garlic bread is delicious

name: Danny Powell
text: Excellent service

name: marcus johnson
text: My wife called and tried to talk to someone named Lou Ann. Instead of doing her job Lou Ann was rude to her and did nothing to help her. Veru unprofessional person.

name: John Bone
text: Helped us many times through the years!

name: Alan Bates
text: Michael is unknowledgeable.Calls people to threaten and harasse them into fixing his mistake.

name: Angel Garner
text: Michael is great, extremely professional and knowledgable. He really helped my husband and me out, and if we ever need services like that again will definitely do business with them. Thank you so much.

name: Jason M
text: Scott and Michael are your "GO TO " guys for real estate closing . 5 stars all the way. Honest , Friendly good people. I Highly recommend this business !!

name: Claudia Rossi
text: As a mortgage lender, I've used Secure Title to close loans for many of my clients.  They are extremely knowledgeable about what they do and provide excellent service to Supreme Lending and our customers.  I'm able to call them whenever my customers have real estate or title questions, and always get a quick response. Scott takes good care of my customers at the closing table, Michael is a genius at title research, and Karen is one of the best in the city at preparing settlement statements fast and accurately.

name: SAR SecureLaw
text: Friendly,  wealth of information and reasonable pricing.

name: Alex Higgins
text: No better company for the job

name: Mark Atchison
text: Extremely well organized closing. Karen was very professional and de-stressed the process for us. I recommend, if needing title services.

name: Brooke Harris
text: Anchor Title makes the closing process smooth sailing!! Such a great team..

name: Ricky Louis
text: Staff is amazing and very helpful.  They were very patient with me and answered all my questions. Y'all are the best Anchor Title!!!

name: jarrod cunningham
text:
Throughout the time we were under contract they were less than helpful when it comes to getting paperwork to my bank. This almost caused me to miss my closing date. Luckily my bank and realtor were great and I had to get involved and add to  already stressful move.

On closing day my timeframe kept getting pushed to the point I had to miss a pick up time for my pets and spend more money.

No I still have not received my deed over 60 days later for tax purposes. I had to call them just to get an email version.

Do not do business here.

name: Ricki Andrews
text: Brien Griggers is so wonderful to work with. Very knowledgeable and customer service oriented! I'd recommend him to everyone.

name: Tom Aiken
text: Brian Griggers knows his stuff.  Pleasure to work with.  You will not go wrong here . . .

name: Jennifer Reid
text: Brien and the team at Anchor Title work very hard for their clients and go out of their way to make closings as seamless as possible for them. I would highly recommend doing title insurance work with Anchor!

name: Casey Benefield
text:
For sale by owner situation, individual cash sale. Needed a title search to ensure no claims/liens are against the property ONLY. No closing service was needed. It was a $4000 parcel to add on to my home.

This company decided to refuse to assist me and get snippy with me...because of evidently not wanting to work with a realtor.

The fact of the matter is, I have a Metlife prepaid legal plan, was working on the advisement of Rolland Milling Law to contact Chicago Title, who told me to call you to  place the order for a title search...... You stopped me dead in my tracks.

After the way I was treated on the phone, not going to happen. I'll just have to keep looking.

name: Will Slappey
text: Ben Miller is one of the best in this business.  He goes above and beyond to make sure the title is right and is done on time.  Anytime I have questions about a title I call Land Title.  Thanks guys!

name: Ashlee Phillips
text: Ben Miller and the Land Title Company are highly recommended.

name: Theresa G
text: Pleasant and thorough. Job well done.

name: B Andrews
text: Great business 2 business!

name: Lynx Brammer
text: Quick and painless sell of my home handled here.  Very schedule accommodating.

name: M. C.
text: Excellent customer service!

name: John Sasser
text: Very on the ball pleasant experience

name: Charles Harris
text: Good service and nice people on point with service

name: Courtney Seals
text: Kim is the best

name: Jane Lee
text: Markie and Marla were awesome!  They were efficient and super responsive. I highly recommend Redstone Title Services.

name: Nikkia Dollar
text: Smooth simple process, easy communication, would use them again!

resp.text: Thank you Nikkia!!!  We appreciated the opportunity to serve.

name: Christina Bartlett
text: This was my first experience with Redstone Title Services as a Realtor and I highly recommend them! They were friendly, professional and very helpful.

name: Alysia Miles
text: Pauline Childers is the best. She really knows her stuff and is soooo sweet. I highly recommend her!

name: Kevin Hauck
text: We had a great experience working with Redstone Title for our refinance. They took care of everything quickly, and communicated well. We really appreciated them being able to send the notary to our house for closing, because we were having to deal with virtual school at the same time. We would definitely use them again.

resp.text: Thank you so much for taking the time to review us!!!  We appreciated the opportunity to serve.

name: eSYNCS Advertising Agency
text: I highly recommend Redstone Title Services and especially Pauline Childers. She is very knowledgeable and will answer any and all questions you may have. Highly recommended!

name: dennis rushing
text: Great Title Service company. Happy to work with Pauline Childers! Will use in the future.

name: Dawn Sims
text: Very easy to work with. Even during these unfamiliar times during a pandemic they made things very easy and safe and made us feel very comfortable. We used them for our land closing and will be using them on the sale of our home and hopefully again with the build of our new home at closing.

name: Mark Havira
text: Professional and friendly. Made you feel at ease and answered all our questions.

name: LAQ Shipman
text: Redstone Title Services definitely surpassed our expectations. They made our closing experience effortless despite being out of state. If needed, we would do it all over again. We definitely recommmend them to potential clients. You will not be disappointed! We are truly 100% satisfied! #NoRegrets

resp.text: We are grateful for the opportunity to serve you. Thank you so much for taking the time to review us.  Your kind words energize our team!

name: Collis Sims
text: Friendly and fast

name: Matthew “Matt S”
text: In and out. Bit of a wait

name: Deb Long
text: Was forced to use this company through a transaction.  The Alta was incorrect, and after 3 weeks we still have not received proceeds from the transaction.  You absolutely cannot "reli" on this company.  You would think that when dealing with thousands of dollars this company would eagerly want to correct issues to ensure speedy payment to all parties. Instead, they are more about moving on to the next transaction than making sure all of the details are handled from current or past business.  Do yourself a favor and choose a different closing representative.

name: D Laken
text: Easy to find. Felt very safe here as they are following Covid guidelines by social distancing, masks, hand sanitizer, and wiping everything down. Very organized professional.

name: Karla Young
text: Can’t say enough about how professional these folks are.  Getting a loan closed on a refi during a pandemic not the easiest thing to do!  But Reli had a great set up that put me at ease, social distancing, gloves, masks, hand sanitizer the works!!  Thank you all so very much.  God bless and keep you.

name: Brice Jackson
text: Reli is the perfect name for this title company! Paige Briggs thank you for all you do! You are the best!

name: Jorge Medina
text: Friendly and kind people!

name: Ryan
text: Worst company ever to deal with.  Company is very unprofessional and believes in giving the runaround. This location doesn't believe in sticking to deadlines and having a sense of urgency. I wouldnt recommend this company to anyone if you are serious about handling professional business or making sure you information is accurate.

name: Austin and Britney Parker
text: Shelly is amazing and cares about her clients

name: Kathy Crook
text: Friendly staff.

name: Jeff Phillips
text: Ben Blackerby and the entire team were a pleasure to work with! I'm sure navigating though the endless amounts of paper is a real task, I'm sure, but they made it seem easy. Ben came to our place of business so it really couldn't have been more convenient for us in the closing process as well! Thanks to the entire team for a job well done!!

name: Mo B
text: They performed title search and acquired clear title to my property and did the closing for me for a reasonable fee. They answered my questions and returned my calls in a timely manner (when the agent wasn't in the office when i called in). I have only used them once.

name: Trey Horton
text: I have used Commonbond Title for years to close my deals. They are by far the most professional closing company around. Every time it was on time. Closing was extremely well explained. Can't go wrong. Highly recommended. In Particular, Ben, Patrick and Nicole have been amazing closing agents and I will use them on my next transaction.

name: Danny Raymond
text: Ben Blackerby is the best in the business.

name: Michelle Lowery Combs
text: Professional, helpful, and courteous!

name: Juanita Kirksey
text: Hello I would like to say this was my first encounter with this company. I learned about this company through the buyer of my home. From communication with the buyer this company handled the preparing and process of another closing, which he dealt with one particular lady, whom I didn't get an opportunity to encounter. He stated she was very pleasant to work with. However, what I believe experience was totally the opposite. There's a saying, " one bad apple, could ruin the bunch. The day of closing I was called to come into the office early, which wasn't an issue, however, after receiving documents to sign, I noticed a payment that I was definitely not aware and didn't understand why I wasn't contacted early on how I wanted to handle the situation ((my daughter's debt), which they took upon themselves to handle. After bringing it to the attention and questioning W. Patrick Cockrell, he became rude and very unprofessional. He began accusing me of having an attitude and how he didn't want to complete my closing. However, I stated several times I didn't have an attitude only concern about not being contacted. He insisted I did. Another lady from the office asked another employee to stay in the office during document signing. While signing he rudely slung documents across to me. I have never experienced such an cruel, unethical, and unprofessional atmosphere( in which he set the scene). If only I had a choice, this company would not have been my choice. I only pray this helps someone else from an unethical experience with Patrick Cockrell. I'm sure this business has many beautiful, professional people apart of it, I'm very disappointment and feel strongly everything could have and should have been done differently on there part.

name: Jacob Heidkamp
text: Difficult to deal with if you are not a lender

name: Deb “Deb” cal
text: So far so good, we'll see how it ends up.

name: harold collins
text: Jefferson Title has handles all of my encounters with them with the utmost professionalism.  They are responsive with any questions myself or my clients may have.  Would highly recommend using Jefferson Title for title and closing.

resp.text: Thanks for the kind words Harold.  Always a pleasure working with you and your team!

name: Jeff D
text: Jefferson title is a great title/closing company  imo. They stay in constant contact, navigate through issues, professional and courteous and gets the job done.

resp.text: Thank you for the great review, Jeff!

name: Rider 0401
text: They did our closing and were fantastic!  The staff was extremely knowledgeable and friendly and we were in and out in less than an hour.  I will definitely be using them again.

resp.text: Thank you Kristina

name: Eric Byrd
text: This was hands down the best experience from start to finish when it came to meeting my needs w regards to my closing on my home. I was able to get title work and closing services in one place and despite the issues from past closings the process was made so quick and easy by the entire staff the closing was great but the title issues although quiet horrific were explained in terms I could understand and rectified with ease by the underwriting and research department. Thank you to all at Jefferson Title for making this otherwise daunting experience a joy in the end. I will recommend Jefferson Title to all of my friends especially my real estate agent friends. If you aren't committed to a title company I highly recommend giving them a shot, it's a one stop shop for all your needs for home closings and that made a deal that would have take twice as long at an attorney's office transpire in less than a month and a week and a half earlier than the actual scheduled closing date. Thanks Jefferson Title and a special thanks to Mary, Jennifer Angela, denise and Bob these are all kind people who tool time out to make me understand what issues we were up against and thanks to everyone else in the department for assisting them in making my wife and my dream of owning the perfect home for us a reality.

resp.text: Thank you Eric, we appreciate it.

name: Scotty D. Vines
text: Jefferson Title is very professional and thorough with closing and title services!  Would love to have all my closings with them!

resp.text: Thank you Scotty, we appreciate it.

name: David White
text: Great customer service with lower fees than other title companies in the area.

resp.text: Thank you David, we appreciate your excellent review.

name: Laura Kimes, Realtor
text: The service, dedication, and attention to detail at Jefferson Title are consistently outstanding.

resp.text: Thank you

name: Frank Mullinax
text: Not reputable -  DO NOT USE.  If they make a mistake, they make you pay for it.  We used them for our closing and less than 24hrs after issuing us our check after closing, put a stop payment on it because they said there was a mistake, before even talking with us!  Extremely unprofessional.  We will never use them again.

resp.text: Greetings Frank– Thank you very much for taking the time to review our location. Your input, and the feedback from all of our customers are vitally important to us and I have sent this over to the staff for review.

name: John Laird
text: Great service.

resp.text: Thank you

name: Jennie Davis
text: I received superior service from this Law Firm.They go above and beyond to make sure you received the good outcome.They will always entertain your needs. They are the best  and I would always be grateful to my attorney  Corey.He is always willing to help. I recommend this Law Firm.

resp.text: Thank you Jennie!  We appreciate your business and kind words.

name: Ron Dumas
text:
Mr. Lipscomb is very professional and also very affable to deal with.
His staff is the same way and I enjoy seeing them.  They treat me like
family.  I would highly recommend Benton and Lipscomb to anyone
having a need for legal matters.  They have helped me a number of
times over the last 10 years. I appreciate them very much and do not
hesitate to call on them if the need arises.

resp.text: We appreciate you as well Mr. Dumas.  Thank you for the feedback.

name: Tony Henley
text: Allen and his team are my go-to guys for legal advice/assistance. They have impeccable ethics and will do what is best for their clients long before profits come to mind. A rarity in any profession these days. Also keen, meticulous,  extremely knowledgeable. Want a solid legal cornerstone? You will find the best of it with Benton and Lipscomb in Fairhope, Al

resp.text: Thank you for the review Mr. Henley.  We love our clients and community and are glad that it shows through our work!

name: Sara Smith
text: I would recommend this law firm to anyone who wants to be treated like they matter!  Alan, Corey, & Laura are more concerned about your well being versus lining their own pockets.  They make you feel at home and go above and beyond to help you through the process!  I can't thank them enough and in the future I will use them again and again.

resp.text: Thanks for the review.  I'm glad we could help.

name: Deborah O'Donnell
text: Mr. Lipscomb is so kind and so knowledgeable and understanding. He has been a huge help dealing with various issues.

resp.text: Thank you for your kind words!  It's been a pleasure working with you.

name: renee beasley
text: I have been using Benton & Lipscomb for years.  I love this whole office.  They care about their clients.  They go about and beyond any other Title company I have used.  Angel and Alan (entire office) return calls even if it is late in the evenings.  They get the job done.  Thank you for all you do.. Sperry CGA (Andrews Group) Birmingham..

resp.text: Thank you Renee!  We love you too!

name: Kiel Rubio
text: The staff at Benton and Lipscomb set the standard for customer service.  They are responsive, easy to get in touch with, and are industry leaders in terms of communication in my opinion.  I prefer Benton and Lipscomb over their competitors because I know I can put what ever I need in their hands and it will be done right and on time.

resp.text: Thank you for the kind words Kiel!  We appreciate your business.  You are such a pleasure to work with.

name: Vickie Fisher
text: Alan is the best attorney. He has handled many of my things for my family and there have tons of things. He is honest, straightforward and very helpful..

resp.text: Thanks Vickie!

name: Daniel Davis
text: Alan Made our first closing as easy and painless as possible! Will Definitely use again.

resp.text: Thank you Mr. Davis!  It was a pleasure working with you.

name: Lee Walker
text: Excellent Firm and great service.  Very easy to work with here in town and highly recommend.

resp.text: Thanks!  We appreciate you.

name: sheila fisher
text: Genuine staff with true concern and great insight. Very knowledgeable and helpful!

resp.text: Thanks Sheila!

name: Tammy Duncan
text: They are so very kind and willing to help me and my family. They will call you right back. They are very professional

resp.text: Thank you Tammy!  We appreciate the kind words. You have been a joy to work with!

text: This is the best law firm in Fairhope and is extremely reasonable, they are not interested in running up a big bill and more interested in helping you with your issues.

resp.text: Thank you for the kind words Mr. Fisher!

text: We have used Alan for years. Not only a great attorney, but a great person.

resp.text: Thank you Mr. Pulliam.  It's always a pleasure working with you.

text: Mr. Lipscomb treats us like family. All of our related work is sent to his firm and he has delivered outstanding results to our firm and our family for over 20 years!

resp.text: Thank you Walt!

text: Very pleased with the work, service, responses and fees  RS

resp.text: Thank you!  We appreciate your business!

text: Great attorneys, they meet with you and listen to your issue. Corey is especially good in court proceedings related to do with family and divorce courts. Highly recommend.

text: Great staff. Mr Lipscomb is helpful, reliable and knowledgeable.

resp.text: Thank you for the feedback Jamie!  We appreciate your business.

name: Mary Barrett
text: Do you want an attorney who won't call you back, use this firm!

resp.text: I'm sorry you didn't receive a call back from our office.  This is abnormal for our office as most of our clients are very pleased with our services.  We would love the chance to make this right.  If you are still in need of legal services please call 928-0282 and ask for Laura.

text: Angel and crew are amazing!!
